3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" class="s10"></span></span><span style="top: -3.677em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal">n</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">RT</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.936em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h1 level="1" id="adiabatic-isentropic-thermodynamic-process">ADIABATIC / ISENTROPIC THERMODYNAMIC PROCESS<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#adiabatic-isentropic-thermodynamic-process" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h1></div><p>→ Is a process in which the working substance neither receives or loses out heat to its surrounding during expansion or compression. This will only happen when the working substance remains thermally insulated so that no heat enters nor leaves the system.</p><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="characteristic-of-adiabatic-process">Characteristic of Adiabatic Process<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#characteristic-of-adiabatic-process" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h2></div><p>i) No heat enters nor leaves the system.
ii) Temperature of the gas changes because the work is done at the caused of internal energy.
iii) Change in internal energy is equal to the work done.</p><p>It's general formula: <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\gamma =</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.625em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.05556em;">γ</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span></span></span></span></span> Is the ration of the two specific heat.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">PV = C</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mtext>gamma</mtext><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace width="1em"></mspace><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">(\text{gamma}) \quad \gamma = \frac{C P}{C V}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s13"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">gamma</span></span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right: 1em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.05556em;">γ</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 2.0463em; vertical-align: -0.686em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 1.3603em;"><span style="top: -2.314em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" class="s10"></span></span><span style="top: -3.677em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">CP</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.686em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="derivations-of-its-formulas">Derivations of its Formulas<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a class="katex"><span class="km"><math fence="true">(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\log \left( class="s17"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">1</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" 0.836em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="mclose delimcenter" style="top: 0em;"><span class="delimsizing size3">)</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>Ex.1.</p><ol><li>1 Litre of Hydrogen gas at 0°C is suddenly isentropically compressed to half of its volume. Find the change in temp of the gas, if the ratio of the too specific heats for hydrogen is 1.4.</li></ol><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mtext>C</mtext><mo>+</mo><mn>273</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>273</mn><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msqrt><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">=</mo></msqrt><mn>1.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
V_1 = 1L \\
T_1 = 0^\circ \text{C} + 273 = 273K \\
V_2 = 0.5L \\
T_2 = \\
\sqrt{=} 1.4 \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 6em; vertical-align: -2.75em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="s19">K</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>CS CamScanne</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>log</mi><mo></mo><mn>2.6786</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>60205.997</mn><mn>0.427907</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>140698.794</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.407</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
\text{b)} \quad \gamma = \frac{\log \left[ \frac{P_2}{P_1} \right]}{\log \left( \frac{V_1}{V_2} \right)} \\
\gamma = \log \frac{4 \times 10^5}{10^5} \\
\frac{\log \left( 0.15 \right)}{0.056} \\
\gamma = \frac{\log (4 \times 10^5)}{\log 2.6786} = \frac{60205.997}{0.427907} = 140698.794 \\
\gamma = 1.407 \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 8.058em; vertical-align: -3.779em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.8451em;"><span style="top: -2.655em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">0.427907</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" class="s10"></span></span><span style="top: -3.394em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">60205.997</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.345em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mo">140698.794</span></span></span><span style="top: -0.091em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3.51em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.05556em;">γ</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mo">1.407</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 3.779em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-error" title="ParseError: KaTeX parse error: Double subscript at position 214: … R + C_V \\
C_P_̲1 = C_{P_2} \\
…" style="color: rgb(204, 0, 0);">\begin{array}{l}
\text{c)} \quad \mathrm{d} u = U_2 - U_1 = m C_V (T_2 - T_1) \\
\text{Two specific heats (Cp and Cv)} \\
R = C_P - C_V \quad \gamma = \frac{C_P}{C_V} \quad C_P = \gamma C_V \\
C_P = R + C_V \\
C_P_1 = C_{P_2} \\
R + C_V = \gamma C_V \\
R = \gamma C_V - C_V \\
R = C_V (\gamma - 1) \\
R = cV (\gamma - 1) \\
289.4 = C_V (1.4^{07}1) \\
C_V = \frac{289.4}{0.407} \\
C_V = 711.06 \\
C_V = 711.06 J \text{ kg} \text{K} \\
\end{array}</span></div><p>CS CamScanne</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mn>289.4</mn><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><mn>711.06</mn><mo separator="true">;</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>289.4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>711.06</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mi>K</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></mstyle></mstyle></menclose></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>u</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo fence="true">[</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo fence="true">]</mo></mrow><msqrt><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></msup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><mn>288</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><menclose notation="box"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mn>0.056</mn></mstyle></mstyle></mstyle></menclose></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mn>0.15</mn></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><mn>288</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.3733</mn><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mn>0.407</mn></msup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><mn>288</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.66964</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>288</mn><mn>0.66964</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>430.08</mn><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>u</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.18</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>711.06</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>430.08</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>288</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><menclose notation="box"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mn>127.9908</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>142.08</mn></mrow></mstyle></mstyle></mstyle></menclose></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>18184.93</mn><mi>J</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>18.18493</mn><mi>K</mi><mi>J</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
R = C_p - C_v \\
289.4 = C_p - 711.06; \\
C_p = 289.4 + 711.06 \\
= \boxed{1000, 46J/KgK} \\
du = U_2 - U_1 = m C_v (T_2 - T_1) \\
\frac{T_1}{T_2} = \left[ \frac{V_2}{V_1} \right]^{\sqrt{-1}} \\
\frac{288}{T_2} = \boxed{0.056} \\
0.15 \\
\frac{288}{T_2} = (0.3733)^{0.407} \\
\frac{288}{T_2} = 0.66964 \\
T_2 = \frac{288}{0.66964} = 430.08K \\
du = m C_v (T_2 - T_1) \\
= 0.18 \times 711.06 (430.08 - 288) \\
\boxed{127.9908 \times 142.08} \\
= 18184.93J \\
= 18.18493KJ \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 21.2656em; vertical-align: -10.3828em;"></span><span class="mo"><span \text{W.D} = \frac{P_2 V_2 - P_1 V_1}{\sqrt{-1}} = du \\
\text{Molecular mass of the gas.} \\
e) \quad M = \frac{R_u}{R} \\
= \frac{8314.1J}{289.4} \times 8.3141KJ/KgK \\
= 28.73Kg. \\

A system contains <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>0.15</mn><mtext></mtext><msup><mtext>m</mtext><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">0.15 \, \text{m}^3</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.81em;"></span><span class="mo">0.15</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">m</span></span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height:.81em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">3</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span> of gas at a pressure of 3.8 bar and <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msup><mn>150</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">150^\circ \text{C}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mo">15</span><span class="mo"><span class="mo">0</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.6741em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mbin mtight">∘</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">C</span></span></span></span></span></span>. It is expanded adiabatically till pressure falls to 1 bar. The gas is then heated at a constant pressure till its enthalpy increases by 70 KJ. Determine the total work done by the gas. Take <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>kJ</mtext><mtext></mtext><mtext>kg</mtext><mtext></mtext><mtext>K</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_p = 1 \, \text{kJ} \, \text{kg} \, \text{K}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.9694em; vertical-align: -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.1514em;"><span class="s38"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">p</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2861em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s47"></span><span class="mo">1</span><span class="ms" class="mo">kg</span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">K</span></span></span></span></span></span>, <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.714</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>kJ</mtext><mtext></mtext><mtext>kg</mtext><mtext></mtext><mtext>K</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_v = 0.714 \, \text{kJ} \, \text{kg} \, \text{K}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s14"></span><span src="assets/images/image-20251216-e96bf6ee.jpeg" alt="img-16.jpeg"></p><p>CS</p><p>CamScanne</p><ol start="4"><li>0.336m³ of gas at 10 bars and 150°C expands adiabatically until its pressure is 4 bars. It is then compressed is thermally to its original volume. Find the final temp and pressure of the gas. Also determine the change in internal energy.</li></ol><p>Take <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.996</mn><mtext>&nbsp;kJ/kgK</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_p = 0.996 \text{ kJ/kgK}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.9694em; vertical-align: -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.1514em;"><span class="s38"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">p</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2861em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s13"></span><span class="mo">0.996</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">&nbsp;kJ/kgK</span></span></span></span></span></span>, <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>V</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.703</mn><mtext>&nbsp;kJ/kgK</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_V = 0.703 \text{ kJ/kgK}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s14"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3283em;"><span class="s38"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span states that the pressure of a fixed mass of a gas is inversely proportional to the volume, provided the temp is kept constant.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s14"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s17"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span></span></span></span></span></div><p>Charle's law</p><p>→ It states that the volume of a fixed mass of a gas is directly proportional to its absolute temp provided pressure is kept constant.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" Lussac's law</p><p>→ It states that the pressure of a fixed mass of a gas is directly proportional to its absolute temp at a constant volume.</p><div class="math math-display"><span CamScanner</p><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h1 level="1" id="derivation-of-workdone-in-adiabatic-process">Derivation of workdone in Adiabatic Process.<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#derivation-of-workdone-in-adiabatic-process" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h1></div><p>The general formulae, in adiabatic process:</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>P</mi><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mtext>hence;</mtext></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>P</mi><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
P V ^ {r} = C \\
P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} = P _ {2} V _ {2} ^ {r} = C \\
P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} = C \\
\text{hence;} \\
P V ^ {r} = P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} \\
P = \frac{P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r}}{V ^ {r}} \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 7.3872em; vertical-align: -3.4436em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span><span class="col-align-l"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 3.9436em;"><span style="top: -6.1308em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3.0272em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.6644em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">r</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span></span></span><span style="top: -4.9308em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3.0272em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.6644em;"><span style="top: -2.4519em; margin-left:-.22em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span></span></span></span><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">r</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2481em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.6644em;"><span style="top: -2.4519em; margin-left:-.22em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal formulae:</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" V</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.03785em;">δ</span><span class="s7">V</span></span></span></span></span></div><p>Integrating from state (1) to state (2)</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math style="height: 1.564em;"><span style="top: -1.7881em; margin-left: -0.4445em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span encoding="application/x-tex">W _ {1 - 2} = \int_ {1} ^ {2} P d V</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.8917em; vertical-align: -0.2083em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">W</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span><span class="mbin mtight">−</span><span mtight">1</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.8129em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.9119em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="mord mathnormal">d</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span></span></span></span></span></div><p>Substituting for P:</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup></mfrac><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup></mfrac><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msup><mi>V</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><msubsup><mrow><mo fence="true">[</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>V</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo fence="true">]</mo></mrow><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><msubsup><mrow><mo fence="true">[</mo><msup><mi>V</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></msup><mo fence="true">]</mo></mrow><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo fence="true">[</mo><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></msubsup><mo>−</mo><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></msubsup><mo fence="true">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
W _ {1 - 2} = \int_ {1} ^ {2} \frac {P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r}}{V ^ {r}} d V \\
= P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} \int_ {1} ^ {2} \frac {1}{V ^ {r}} d V = P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} \int_ {1} ^ {2} V ^ {- r} d V \\
= P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} \left[ \frac {V ^ {- r + 1}}{- r + 1} \right] _ {1} ^ {2} \\
= \frac {P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r}}{1 - r} \left[ V ^ {1 - r} \right] _ {1} ^ {2} \\
= \frac {P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r}}{1 - r} \left[ V _ {2} ^ {1 - r} - V _ {1} ^ {1 - r} \right] \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 7.6978em; vertical-align: -3.5989em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span><span class="col-align-l"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 4.0989em;"><span style="top: -6.4257em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3.354em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">W</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span><span class="mbin mtight">−</span><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2083em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mop"><span class="mop op-symbol small-op" style="margin-right: 0.19445em; position: relative; top: -0.0006em;">∫</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 1.009em;"><span style="top: -2.3442em; margin-left: -0.1945em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" a negative sign.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" expansion</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">W_{1-2} = \frac{P_2 V_2 - P_1 V_1}{r - 1}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.8917em; vertical-align: -0.2083em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">W</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: compression,</p><p>an example is the expansion of combustion gases in the cylinder of a water cooled reciprocating engine</p><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 0.836em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>CS CamScanne</p><p>2.) <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>D</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">W_{1}D</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s14"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">W</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span></span></span></span></span> in PolyTropic</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace width="1em"></mspace><mtext>(For&nbsp;expansion)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace width="1em"></mspace><mtext>(For&nbsp;compression)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>R</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
W_{pol} = \frac{P_1 V_1 - P_2 V_2}{n-1} \quad \text{(For expansion)} \\
\\
W_{pol} = \frac{P_2 V_2 - P_1 V_1}{n-1} \quad \text{(For compression)} \\
\\
W_{pol} = \frac{m R (T_1 - T_2)}{n-1}
